email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for 10,000MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wilson,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer the vessel MV OCEAN STAR for your 10,000MT coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai on CIF terms.

The vessel has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m. The laycan is set for 20-25 October, and the initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per MT. Demurrage is set at USD 15,000 per day.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you require any adjustments.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Sea Brokers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for 10,000MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 40.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the laycan and any potential delays?

Best regards,
James Wilson
Atlantic Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for 10,000MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-standing relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 41.00 per MT. The laycan remains 20-25 October, and there are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Sea Brokers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for 10,000MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 41.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best regards,
James Wilson
Atlantic Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for 10,000MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Newcastle on 20th October, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Sea Brokers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for 10,000MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
James Wilson
Atlantic Charterers
